vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Κενχρεαί (Rec. Κεχγ-; ν. WH, App., 150), -ῶν, αἱ,
Cenchreæ, a port of Corinth: Act.18:18, Rom.16:1.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: § Cenchreae, the port of Corinth on the Saronic Gulf; Acts 18:18; Rom. 16:1*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
堅革哩 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "小米"
哥林多的海港 (徒 18:18; 羅 16:1,27)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
坚革哩 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "小米"
哥林多的海港 (徒 18:18; 罗 16:1,27)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Sen-cơ-rê. Hải cảng phía Đông trong hải cảng của thành Cô-rinh-tô
